description:
Sharik is an open-source, cross-platform solution for sharing files via Wi-Fi or Mobile Hotspot.
The app works with a Wi-Fi connection or a Wi-Fi Hotspot.
No internet connection is needed.
It is available for Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, and Linux.
summary: Sharik is an open-source, cross-platform solution for sharing files via Wi-Fi or Mobile Hotspot
author: marchellodev
